title: Charming New Zealand Country House Retreat with NZ$100 Hotel Credit
description: Escape the ordinary and venture to the heart of New Zealand’s North Island with a truly unique stay at Henley Hotel - a thoroughly modern country house hotel located in Cambridge, a charming town less than two hours’ drive from Auckland. A modern and quirky interpretation of an English country manor, this beautifully styled hotel sets the stage for a romantic escape. Experience ultimate pampering with daily à la carte breakfast, NZ$100 hotel credit per room and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
offer_address: 151 Maungatautari Rd, Leamington, Cambridge 3495, New Zealand

title: Newly-Opened: Charming and Elegant Country House Retreat in New Zealand
description: Escape the ordinary and venture to the heart of New Zealand’s North Island, for a unique stay at the newly opened Henley Hotel - a thoroughly modern country house hotel located in Cambridge, a charming town less than two hours’ drive from Auckland. A modern and quirky interpretation of an English country manor, this beautifully styled hotel sets the stage for a romantic getaway where you will be pampered with daily à la carte breakfast, a NZ$100 hotel credit and a guaranteed 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 151 Maungatautari Rd, Leamington, Cambridge 3495, New Zealand

title: New Zealand Bespoke Farmhouse Retreat with Animal Encounter & Daily Breakfast Hamper
description: Escape real life for rolling hills and farming countryside at The Good Life Retreat. Showcasing New Zealand's verdant beauty, this bespoke designer refuge is also the ultimate animal attraction. Get close to adorable hand-reared feathered friends and lively livestock as you feed and care for this marvellous menagerie. Boasting one of the most beautiful gardens in the region, the lush greenery conceals swings for children, a fairy house and a play house with a mezzanine floor. Soak in the spa, plunge into the heated pool or unwind under the stars in an outdoor bath after indulging in the well-stocked wine cellar and fruits of the orchard.

title: Boutique Cambridge Escape on the Bank of the River Cam
description:
Escape to a city steeped in ancient tradition, home to magnificent architecture and shadowed emerald meadows, with a stay at the boutique Graduate Cambridge. Flanked by the gentle waters of the winding River Cam, the hotel is a celebration, equal parts ironic and sincere, of everything that makes the university city so extraordinary, from the rich eight centuries of academia to the ancient punting boats that still glide across the river waters. The nearby gardens are brimming with ducks, swans and students, and the central location makes exploring the town’s cobbled streets and crooked allies a breeze.

Access to the Graduate Cambridge’s modern leisure club - decked out with a gymnasium, inside pool, sauna, steam room and jacuzzi - is a highlight, but it’s the hotels 'The Garden House' restaurant’s season-driven, uniquely British plates and stunning riverside views that will guarantee an unforgettable escape. After you're done feasting, visit the onsite Garden Bar and enjoy a range of delicious wines and handcrafted cocktails that speak to Cambridge's rich history.
offer_address: Granta Pl, Mill Ln, Cambridge, CB2 1RT, United Kingdom

title: Countryside Spa Sanctuary Moments from Historic Cambridge
description:
Discover a relaxing spa haven on the fringes of historic Cambridge with a stay at the stylish Cambridge Belfry Hotel & Spa. 

This is the perfect place to relax and recharge in-between days exploring this storied city's exquisite architecture, picturesque college gardens and historic pubs. Uncover fabulous facilities including The Bridge Restaurant and The Lounge Bar, an inviting heated pool and a luxurious day spa boasting a sauna, steam room and blissful ELEMIS treatments. What’s more, you’re only around a 15-minute drive from Cambridge's renowned Parker's Piece - a 25-acre open common - the eponymous Cambridge University Botanical Gardens and Fitzwilliam Museum.
offer_address: Back Ln, Great Cambourne, Cambourne, Cambridge CB23 6BW, United Kingdom

title: Charming Cambridge Escape with Indoor Pool & Health Club
description: Step back in time to discover the historic beauty of one of England’s extraordinary university towns with a stay at Holiday Inn Cambridge, an IHG Hotel. Cambridge is home a mass of traditional English pubs, stunning centuries-old architecture and quintessential English countryside charm. Onsite, gather energy with a coffee at Hub Bar or a hearty dinner at Junction Restaurant, or unwind to the next level with a treatment at the Spirit Health Club.
location_description: Holiday Inn Cambridge, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Lakeview, Cambridge, Cambridgeshire CB24 9PH, United Kingdom

title: Boston City Stay Near Harvard Square With Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Dive headfirst into Boston's hub of excellence at Kimpton Marlowe; a stunningly opulent Cambridge stay just minutes from Harvard Square and storied cultural destinations. Convene in the Cambridge Lobby Bar for chats around the fire and savour globally-inspired American fare at Bambara Kitchen. Walk the campuses of the worlds finest universities, discover Downtown Boston's spirited sporting culture or stroll along the USA's oldest public park, the Boston Commons, during your stay.
location_description: Kimpton Marlowe Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 25 Edwin H Land Blvd, Cambridge, MA 02141
